Description

Concrete class for working with Item entries.

Methods

addGbaseAttribute, delete, removeGbaseAttribute, save, setItemType,

addGbaseAttribute( string   $name,   $text, string   $type = null, ) : Zend_Gdata_Gbase_ItemEntry

Description

Adds a custom attribute to the entry in the following format: <g:[$name] type='[$type]'>[$value]</g:[$name]>

Arguments

Name Type Description Default
$name string | The name of the attribute
$text n/a
$type string | (optional) The type of the attribute. e.g.: 'text', 'number', 'floatUnit' null

Return value

Type Description
Zend_Gdata_Gbase_ItemEntry Provides a fluent interface

delete(   $dryRun = false, ) : void

Description

Deletes this entry to the server using the referenced Zend_Http_Client to do a HTTP DELETE to the edit link stored in this entry's link collection.

Arguments

Name Type Description Default
$dryRun n/a false

Return value

Type Description
void

Tags

Name Description
throws Zend_Gdata_App_Exception

removeGbaseAttribute( Zend_Gdata_Gbase_Extension_BaseAttribute   $baseAttribute, ) : Zend_Gdata_Gbase_ItemEntry

Description

Removes a Base attribute from the current list of Base attributes

Arguments

Name Type Description Default
$baseAttribute Zend_Gdata_Gbase_Extension_BaseAttribute | The attribute to be removed

Return value

Type Description
Zend_Gdata_Gbase_ItemEntry Provides a fluent interface

save( boolean   $dryRun = false, string|null   $uri = null, string|null   $className = null, array   $extraHeaders = array, ) : Zend_Gdata_App_Entry

Description

Uploads changes in this entry to the server using Zend_Gdata_App

Arguments

Name Type Description Default
$dryRun boolean | Whether the transaction is dry run or not. false
$uri string | null | The URI to send requests to, or null if $data contains the URI. null
$className string | null | The name of the class that should we deserializing the server response. If null, then 'Zend_Gdata_App_Entry' will be used. null
$extraHeaders array | Extra headers to add to the request, as an array of string-based key/value pairs. array

Return value

Type Description
Zend_Gdata_App_Entry The updated entry

Tags

Name Description
throws Zend_Gdata_App_Exception

Arguments

Name Type Description Default

Return value
